DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare overall survival patient advance non small cell lung cancer treat docetaxel single therapy versus docetaxel combination either gemcitabine vinorelbine combination capecitabine .
DOC.brief_title: The DISTAL-2 Study : Docetaxel Alone Combination Second-line Treatment Advanced Non Small-Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This study patient previously diagnose advanced non small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC , stage IIIb IV ) progression disease first-line therapy contain platinum . Patients assign receive 6 cycle therapy one four treatment regimen : - docetaxel - docetaxel + vinorelbine - docetaxel + gemcitabine - docetaxel + capecitabine
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent Age > 18 Histological diagnosis non smallcell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) Stage IIIb Stage IV disease ( IIIb , previous treatment chemotherapy + radiotherapy , metastatic supraclavicular lymph node pleural effusion ) Disease progression Previous chemotherapy platinumderivative ( > 21 day last administration ) ECOG performance status > 2 Age > 75 year History malignant neoplasm within previous 5 year ( except baso spinocellular skin carcinoma insitu carcinoma uterine cervix , provide adequately treat ) Previous treatment docetaxel Presence symptomatic cerebral metastasis Neutrophils < 2.0 x 109/l , platelet < 100,000/l , hemoglobin > 10g/dl Bilirubin < 1.5 x upper normal limit SGOT , SGPT , bilirubin > 1.25 x upper normal limit except presence hepatic metastasis Creatinine > 1.25 x upper normal limit Any concomitant pathology would , Investigator 's opinion , contraindicate use drug protocol Inability comply follow Pregnant nursing female
